author: Special Correspondent
text:
The City Corporation is midway through giving facelift to traffic islands that serve as important landmarks.

Work is presently on at full swing at the traffic island at Bull-Fight Statue junction. The City Corporation and the Police Department had together identified a few traffic islands where some modifications are necessary for better regulation of vehicular movement. New traffic islands are also coming up at Vendipalayam and Solar junctions.

Traffic regulation

In recent months, the shifting of two statues enabled the police department to re-draw the area of temporary traffic island at Government Hospital Junction for better regulation of traffic.

The work on permanent structure will commence at the location only after the Assembly elections.
title: Traffic islands being given a facelift
